## Public Static Functions

### getKindForGlobal() {#a2d7d72e2fddb81783b50ad05b746bc19}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SectionKind TargetLoweringObjectFile::getKindForGlobal (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject">GlobalObject</a> &#42; GO, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp; TM)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Classify the specified global variable into a set of target independent categories embodied in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sectionkind">SectionKind</a>.

getKindForGlobal - This is a top-level target-independent classifier for a global object.

Given a global variable and information from the TM, this function classifies the global in a target independent manner. This function may be overridden by the target implementation.
